snippet: Female sexual dysfunction remains a controversial topic, even as it becomes an official diagnosis and companies have begun creating more products to address it.
abstract: More women are turning to over-the-counter products to increase sexual arousal and pleasure, and companies are responding by creating more products for them; some express concern that commercial efforts to address female sexual dysfunction, which remains difficult to define, may pressure women to see a problem where one does not exist.
lead_paragraph: Female sexual dysfunction remains a controversial topic, even as it becomes an official diagnosis and companies have begun creating more products to address it.

headline.seo: More Women Seek Over-the-Counter Sexual Remedies
headline.main: More Women Look Over the Counter for a Libido Fix
headline.print_headline: More Women Look Over the Counter for a Libido Fix
